attributes.action: allow himself and Alistair Darling to be publicly gunged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the subsequent Police investigation into the Abraham affair in which the PM will be exonerated (and for subsequent and predictable improprieties; Fill in next major abuse of power here..........) it would give the public much satisfaction if the PM and his Chancellor would be publicly gunged. We all know the outcome already and the predictable enquiry at great public expense which will do no more to reconfirm that Government in this country is above the law.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
